titles.title: A bill to require that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/16/1988--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.
